tyA#ha praqjApa#timEqva BA#gaqdhEyE#naq sama#d^^rdhayaqtyUrja#svAqn paya#svAqnityAqhOrja#-mEqvAsmiqn payO# dadhAti prANApAqnau mE# pAhi samAnavyAqnau mE# pAqhItyA#hAq- &&SiSha#mEqvaitAmA SAqstE &kShi#tOq &syakShi#tyai tvAq mA mE$ kShEShThA aqmutrAqmuShmi#n ~MlOqka ityA#haq kShIya#tEq vA aqmuShmi#n ~MlOqkE &nna#miqtaH pra#dAnaq(gg)q hya#muqShmi#n ~MlOqkE ( ) praqjA u#paqjIva#ntiq yadEqva- ma#BimRuqSatyakShi#ti-mEqvaina#dgamayatiq nAsyAqmuShmin ~MlOqkE&nna#M kShIyatE || 14
(aqnvAqhAqryE#Na-praqjApa#tE-rasiq-hya#muShmi#n ~MlOqkE-pa~jca#daSa ca) (A3)
